list.title: list
list.description: List all files in a storage bucket that are prefixed by a specified path name. Files are paginated. `pageSize` is defaulted to 1000. Additionally, the result will include a nextToken if there are more items to retrieve.

options.description: the path prefix for files to include
Whether to list all files within the specified path
Sets the maximum number of files to be return. The range is 0 - 1000
Indicates whether the list is being continued on this bucket with a token

values.description: A list of objects with path and metadata: eTag, lastModified, size for each file
